EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners Inquiry (1322684988.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners Inquiry (1322684988.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Elizabeth,
We do offer access to group benefits. I have attached our 2011 benefits link for your review. http://www.mbopartners.com/mbo-exec-group-benefits
In order for the consultants to join our group benefits they have to be eligible to join our MBO Exec program and work in this program. In order for them to be eligible I would have to have a conversation with each individual to determine if they are a good fit for our program. I would be happy to explain the program to you in detail if you have questions about how it works and what the program has to offer an independent consultant.
Please let me know if you have any additional questions and I would be happy to assist you.
Have a great day, Nicolette ___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
From: recordclick@gmail.com [mailto:recordclick@gmail.com] On Behalf Of Record Click Sent: Tuesday, November 29, 2011 12:09 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Re: MBO Partners Inquiry
Dear Nicolette,
Thank you for the contact. My request is very simple. I would like to know if you are able to offer any kind of group insurance to four contractors in different states?
The states in question are NE, NJ, and CT.
Please let me know if you have such plan or if you have a referral.
This is the only service I need for now. I do however help manage a group of 50 plus independent contractors for the two companies I run.
Thank you!
Elizabeth Khan On Mon, Nov 28, 2011 at 11:16 AM, Nicolette Taylor <ntaylor@mbopartners.com> wrote:
Dear Elizabeth,
Thank you for the inquiry you submitted at the MBO Partners website. I wanted to introduce myself as the person at MBO Partners responsible for all new associate and partnership requests. I’ll be your main point of contact to provide you an overview of our services or answer any specific questions you may have. I know you mentioned that you prefer to correspond by email but I would like to have a brief conversation with you to get a few more details about what you are looking for so I may be able to determine if MBO is a good fit for what your company is looking for. You may easily book a time that is convenient for you on my online schedule by going here: https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK
You can also watch a short video about who we are on You Tube: http://youtu.be/zKDzwSTmGv4.
I look forward to speaking with you and sharing more information about MBO Partners!
Thank you and have a great day! Nicolette ___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Business Manager MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
